topics.body:
"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5508e39c6368720a5d0f0200#post_5508e39c6368720a5d0f0200
I found FMAB to be pretty dang fantastic. The only part I was disappointed with was the kinda meh middle part of the show. The first 20 or so episodes were solid, and the last 20 or so episodes left me more than satisfied.
